EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-07-17-RD-Sponsored-Seattle.ES-2018-06-Seattle Invite 2.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Former Verizon & EMC CIO for Dinner - July 17
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/seattle-executive-networking-dinner-tickets-45999432541]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are pleased to invite you to an exclusive event <[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/seattle-executive-networking-dinner-tickets-45999432541]]>on the evening of July 17th, as we welcome a select group of IT leaders for a networking dinner in the Seattle area. The dinner will be hosted by Vic Bhagat, Senior Advisor at Turbonomic and former CIO at EMC, Verizon and GE.
We hope you will accept this special invitation from Vic to enjoy an evening of networking, food and drink.
<[[https://vmturbo.wistia.com/medias/twj6olytt1]]> RSVP to reserve your spot today! <[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/seattle-executive-networking-dinner-tickets-45999432541]]> <[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/seattle-executive-networking-dinner-tickets-45999432541]]>
We look forward to seeing you there!
- The Turbonomic Team
